chunk:
The Jojoba Company Ultimate Youth Potion

Brand: The Jojoba Company

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Jojoba Oil/Macadamia Seed Oil Esters, Squalene, Ubiquinone (Coenzyme Q10), Sclerocarya Birrea (Marula) Seed Oil, Camellia Oleifera (Camellia) Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil,

(Argan) Kernel Oil, Adansonia Digitata (Baobab) Oil, Phytosteryl Macadamiate, Leptospermum Scoparium (Manuka) Branch/Leaf Oil, Tilia Cordata (Linden Blossom) Oil, Phytosterols◊, Tocopherol.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity
